attributes.action: halt the deportation proceedings against Zoe and Moshi Phiri
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On 21st December 2007 Zoe and Moshi Phiri were informed by the Home Office that they are to be deported to Zimbabwe by 9th April 2008. Zoe and Moshi are just 13 years of age. They escaped Zimbabwe in July 2001 from harrowing circumstances which they had to endure whilst living the Zimbabwe under the “care” of an abusive father. Under the laws of any other European state this would not be allowed. If we do not act now these two innocent young children and their mother shall suffer once again. They need your help.

rejection.details: Inidividual cases are a matter for the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
